title: A miscellania of morall, theologicall and philosophicall sentances [sic] worthy observation.
author: Done, John.
publisher: Printed for Iohn Sweeting at the Angel in Popes-head-alley,
notes: Caption title: Polydoron: or a mescellania of morall, philosophicall, and theologicall sentences.
The epistle dedicatory signed: Iohn Done.
Erroneously attributed to John Donne, Dean of St. Paul's. Cf. Simpson, A study of the prose works of John Donne, 1924, p. 356.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
